introduction: HDFC Bank Parivartan's Educational Crisis Support Scholarship (ECSS) aims to support meritorious and needy students belonging to underprivileged sections of society to help them complete their education.

eligibility_criteria.academic_requirements: Minimum 55% marks in the previous qualifying examination
eligibility_criteria.special_condition: Preference given to students facing personal or family crises (loss of job, death of earning member, etc.)

structure: Undergraduate Courses (B.Tech, B.Sc, etc.): Up to ₹50,000
Postgraduate Courses (M.Tech, MBA, etc.): Up to ₹75,000

documents_required: Family Income Proof (Salary Slip / IT Return / Income Certificate)
